snippet: If Jamaal Charles stays healthy, this offense can be good enough to get by, and the Chiefs have a chance to be contenders in the A.F.C. West.
abstract: If Jamaal Charles stays healthy, this offense can be good enough to get by, and the Chiefs have a chance to be contenders in the A.F.C. West.

headline.main: Kansas City Chiefs, 2012 N.F.L. Season Preview
